2.title: A Killer Conversation
2.plot: Four teenage girls have an unorthodox conversation about a strange subject matter.

imdb.plot outline: Several lives intertwine in this psychological thriller with one common thread; therapy. A famous psychologist examines the many stories of these characters in their everyday lives. While also dealing with her past and navigating her fame in the public eye. With her client's souls committed to destruction, tragedy and revenge. The therapist seek the truth from their fractured souls. This whirlwind of scattered pieces from broken minds will take the therapist on a jigsaw journey for clarity. In the forefront of murder, pedophilia and mental illness will bring together a puzzling picture of a thousand and one stories.
imdb.title: Girls Will Be Girls
plot: Several lives intertwine in this psychological thriller.::A. A. Jones
